ygData.subject: Re: what to do with (for) lev 50s' was Instruments vs.  Melee quandry
ygData.msgSnippet: Sylly you have a good idea hon..now send this to VERRANT! ( how did someone called silly get so wise.... GRIN!?!) Elyana ... etal ... environments
ygData.messageBody:
Sylly you have a good idea hon..now send this to VERRANT! ( how did someone
called silly get so wise.... GRIN!?!)

Elyana

>But that is not the answer - Verant - wake up and make the high level world
>Dynamic! Keep track of the monsters and make them get harder and meaner or
>have better AI depending on how well the last fights were. If Thulaak,
etal
>slays a dragon - make the next one have better guards - or spawn in
>different place with badder stuffs - Make the Planes be dynamic
environments
>- that have dynamic AI for battling these lev 50's. And if you can do this
>in code - you wont have to spend so much resources coding and arting new
>zones - make the ones you got dynamic.
>
>Sylly.
>
